EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Ready for Close
EmailTemplate.subject: Site Visit {!SiteVisit__c.Name} is ready to be closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SiteVisit__c.GrantAdministratorName__c},
This email is to notify you that the sub recipient has responded for site visit : {!SiteVisit__c.SiteVisitName__c} and can now be closed.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the Utah Grants Support Team at utahgrants.support@reisystems.com, if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team utahgrants.support@reisystems.com Ph. No. 703.480.9100
